download_view.description: Download a view from a workbook in the specified format

props.name: viewId
props.description: Select the view to download

props.name: format
props.description: The format to download the view in

props.name: maxAge
props.description: Maximum age of cached data in minutes (default: 60)

props.name: resolution
props.description: Resolution for image format (high for maximum pixel density)

props.name: vizWidth
props.description: Width of the rendered image/PDF in pixels

props.name: vizHeight
props.description: Height of the rendered image/PDF in pixels

props.name: pageType
props.description: Page size for PDF format

props.name: orientation
props.description: Page orientation for PDF format

find_view.description: Finds a view based on name (URL name)

props.name: viewName
props.description: The URL name of the view to find (e.g., Sheet1 from /views/workbook/Sheet1)

find_workbook.description: Finds a workbook based on ID or content URL

props.name: searchType
props.description: Choose whether to search by workbook ID or content URL

props.name: workbookId
props.description: The ID of the workbook to find

props.name: contentUrl
props.description: The content URL of the workbook to find (e.g., "MyWorkbook" from /workbooks/MyWorkbook)

props.name: workbookId
props.description: Select the workbook to refresh

run_extract_refresh_task.description: Runs the specified extract refresh task and returns job information

props.name: taskId
props.description: Select the extract refresh task to run

datasource_event.description: Triggers when a datasource event occurs (created, updated, or deleted)

props.name: eventType
props.description: Select the datasource event to trigger on

datasource_refresh_event.description: Triggers when a datasource refresh event occurs (started, succeeded, or failed)

props.name: eventType
props.description: Select the datasource refresh event to trigger on

label_event.description: Triggers when a label event occurs (created, updated, or deleted)

props.name: eventType
props.description: Select the label event to trigger on

list_extract_refresh_tasks.description: Lists extract refresh tasks for the site

new_job.description: Triggers when a job matches the specified criteria

props.name: jobType
props.description: Filter by job type (optional)

props.name: status
props.description: Filter by job status (optional)

user_deleted.description: Triggers when a user is deleted

view_deleted.description: Triggers when a workbook view is deleted

workbook_event.description: Triggers when a workbook event occurs (created, updated, or deleted)

props.name: eventType
props.description: Select the workbook event to trigger on

workbook_refresh_event.description: Triggers when a workbook refresh event occurs (started, succeeded, or failed)

props.name: eventType
props.description: Select the workbook refresh event to trigger on
